long_description: With its bright red color and flame graphics, the Electra Mini Rod 1 16 in. bike will get boys excited to start biking; a comfortable, stable frame ensures excitement lasts through the whole ride. With a single speed and coaster brake, the child-size Mini Rod is simplicity itself; there are no shifters and hand brakes to worry a new rider. Flame graphics on the frame, fenders and chainguard suit a young man's tastes; he'll find them on the spring-cushioned saddle as well. Custom red rims set the look off nicely. Integrated coaster brake is both effective and intuitively simple to use-just have him pedal in reverse. Sturdy steel frame withstands all sorts of abuse; metal chain cover and fenders help protect child from grime and moving parts. Removable training wheels make learning easy and do wonders for a child's confidence. Ergonomic saddle helps balance the child atop the bike in comfort; handlebar design accommodates an upright ride and enhances control. Wide balloon tires enhance stability and traction. Specs are subject to change.
